attributes.action: demand more moustaches and mullets on the BBC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Polish television has many examples of fine upper lip art. We wish for the BBC to follow suit and bring back fine examples of moustaches, particularly on the flagship 'Six O'Clock News'.

We also demand more mullets, and request that this fine hair form is also represented on public television.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
